info.name: Declutter Series - GetFreeEbooks
info.description: Removes adverts and useless buttons. Faithful in style to unmodified GetFreeBooks, compatible with most other themes. Part of the Declutter Series.
info.additionalInfo:
Items removed:
  • Side bars full of adverts
  • Top bars full of adverts
  • Top bar links to rarely-used pages
  • Adverts in the page flow
